attributes.action: exempt 4x4 owners from additional tax if they can prove the vehicle is required to tow a horse trailer (or genuinely work-related trailer).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thousands of horse owners (especially single women) are already crippled by the increasing costs of horse care/livery charges.Added tax would make it impossibly expensive for many of us to use the horse for the purpose it was bought. The Government should encourage the equine diversification industry, not suppress it.Many small businesses would also be unfairly penalised for towing equipment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
